author: Squidmar Miniatures
description:
Go to https://www.displate.com/squidmar or use my code SQUIDMAR to access my discount 32% OFF 2-3 Displates and 37% off on 4+ Displates. Check out their selected designs that you can now get with the new Textra finish.

In this weeks masterclass miniature painting tutorial. We give you all the steps to paint your dragon Strakh like a true miniature painting master. These tricks can of course be applied on your warhammer painting as well!
